content: mm the item is 6 inches tall -> for the final result to be well-shaped i recommend you to used a hook that 0 5 or 1 size smaller than what your yarn suggested fiber fill yarn needle -plastic canvas optional if you want the gnome to stand on its own 11 |by t h r ea d y a r ns abbreviation st stitch single_crochet single_crochet how to change yarn color slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only only crochet to the back loop of the sts increase increase = make 2 single_crochet from 1 st decrease decrease = make 1 single_crochet from 2 sts double_crochet double_crochet note - stuffing as you go only stuff slightly the arms do not over stuff the arms head &body working in spiral using mustard color round 8-21 blo 42 single_crochet round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 22 5sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 30 round 2 6 increase 12 sts sts round 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x 6 18 sts round 23 4sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 round 4 2sc in the next 2 st increase x 6 24 30 sts sts round 24 3 single_crochet in the next 3st decrease x 6 round 5 3 single_crochet in the next 3 st increase x 6 30 24 sts sts round 25 2 single_crochet in the next 2 st decrease x 6 round 6 4sc in the next 4st increase x 6 36 18 sts sts round 26 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 6 12 sts round 7 5sc in the next 4st increase x 6 42 round 27 6 decrease 6 sts sts fasten_off arms make 2 working in spiral start with skin color change to green yarn round 6-12 9sc round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 13 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 3 6 sts round 2 single_crochet in the next st increase x 3 9 sts round 14 fold in half 2 single_crochet round 3 9sc fasten_off leave yarn tail to sew to the change to red body round 4-5 9sc 12 |by t h r ea d y a r ns gnome s nose working in spiral start with skin color reindeer s nose yarn working in spiral start with red yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 6 increase 12 sts round 2 6 increase 12 sts round 3 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x3 - 15 sts round 3 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x3 - 15 sts round 4 15 single_crochet round 4 15 single_crochet invisible fasten_off invisible fasten_off antlers make 2 working in spiral start with dark do not fasten_off the main beam brown yarn continue from the beam tines make 2 round 5 join the tine make 12 single_crochet 6 single_crochet from round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet the tine and 6 single_crochet from the main beam round 2-3
